data.text:
Published 2:31 am Friday, August 2, 2024

The Colorado State Rams rank fourth in the MWC, with +1200 odds to win the conference title in 2024. Read the article below for more info on the team’s futures championship odds.

Sign up for BetMGM to bet on Colorado State Rams’ odds to win their conference or the national championship.

Colorado State Mountain West Conference and National Championship Odds

National Championship Odds: Currently Unavailable

Mountain West Conference Championship Odds: +1200 (Bet $10 to win $120.00)

Season Win Total Over/Under: 6.5 (Bet $10 to win $10.00 on the over with +100 odds)

Bet on Colorado State Rams futures odds & games on BetMGM.

Colorado State 2024 Schedule

According to the team’s opponents’ combined win total last season (69), Colorado State has been given the 73rd-ranked schedule in college football. The Rams have seven games scheduled against teams that registered winning records in 2023, including one team that tallied nine or more wins and two with fewer than four wins last season.

Watch Colorado State Rams games all season long on Fubo!
